message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. I'm willing to pay that price.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $160. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'd be willing to pay $155 for the product. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $158. It's a great value, and I think you'll be happy with this price.
I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $158. I'd be happy to buy it from you at that price.
